thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Tuesday, 20 Feb 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Sydbank To Implement Share Buyback Programme

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Sydbank To Implement Share Buyback Programme
text:
Feb 20 (Reuters) - SYDBANK A/S:
* SYDBANK TO REPURCHASE SHARES * ‍DECIDED TO IMPLEMENT A SHARE BUYBACK PROGRAMME OF DKK 500M, HOWEVER A MAXIMUM OF 3 MILLION SHARES.​
* USING CLOSING PRICE ON MONDAY 19 FEB BUYBACK EQUALS ABOUT 1.9M SHARES, EQUAL TO 2.8% OF BANK‘S SHARE CAPITAL
* ‍PURPOSE OF SHARE BUYBACK IS TO REDUCE BANK‘S SHARE CAPITAL WITH SHARES PURCHASED UNDER PROGRAMME​
* ‍SHARE BUYBACK PROGRAMME WILL BE INITIATED ON WEDNESDAY 21 FEBRUARY 2018 AND COMPLETED BY 31 DEC 2018​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: (Gdynia Newsroom)
